name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SnapLead: Save LinkedIn Leads with a Single Click

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never Miss a Lead: Instantly Tag and Save LinkedIn Profiles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get instant Email from LinkedIn. Save all your leads in our CRM and contact them later!

SnapLead is a Chrome extension that transforms the way you manage your LinkedIn networking. With just a single click, you can effortlessly tag LinkedIn contacts or perform searches to save profiles for later use.

SnapLead not only simplifies the process of building your lead file but also develops an innovative feature to enrich profiles with email addresses, further enhancing your networking capabilities.

★ Get Access to Contact Details on LinkedIn instantly

With SnapLead, you can find any email by simply visiting a LinkedIn profile.

★ Tag multiple profiles in one click

With SnapLead, it’s easier than ever to save a profile directly to your SnapLead CRM. Tag it in one click, and the contact will be added. You’ll be able to enrich this contact to find the email and contact them later.

You can tag leads one by one, but you can also tag all leads in a search in just one click!

★ Tag all your visited profiles

SnapLead allows you to automatically save every profile that you visited during your search. This is extremely powerful for building your lead pipeline along the way without any effort. On your SnapLead dashboard, you can manage, arrange, and enrich all these profiles.

★ Tag all conversations 

Never send a message to someone you've already chatted with before. With SnapLead, all the people that you have had a conversation with will be automatically tagged to make sure you don’t contact them again. You’ll be able to manage all these profiles on your dashboard.

★ Email finder for your leads

SnapLead offers the most advanced technologies for Email Finder. In just one click, you’ll be able to find the Email Address of all the leads of your choice.

★ Dashboard for Efficient Contact Management

Receive immediate access to a user-friendly dashboard where you can view all tagged contacts and those you've interacted with on LinkedIn.

★ No LinkedIn signup

SnapLead doesn’t need your LinkedIn credentials; everything is managed by the extension, preserving your privacy.

★ Free plan for everyone

We are offering a generous free plan with 50 leads tagged per month. If you need to tag more leads, you can choose one of our paid plans.

★ Paid plans for more tagging

We are offering three paid plans: $29 per month for 200 tags per month, $49 per month for 1,000 tags per month, and $79 per month for 2,000 tags per month.

★ No Intrusive Access Required

SnapLead requires minimal permissions to function effectively. Unlike other tools, it focuses on enhancing your LinkedIn experience without compromising your privacy or security.
